      • h

        public final int h()

      • s

        Returns:
        the saturation component in the range [0;1]

      • l

        public final double l()
        Returns:
        the lightness component in the range [0;1]

      • rgb

        public final RGBColor rgb()
        Returns the equivalent color in RGB space; see d3.rgb for details on the returned object. The conversion from HSL to RGB is described in CSS3 Color Module Level 3.
        Returns:

      • brighter

        public final HSLColor brighter()
        Returns a brighter copy of this color yith a gamme of 1.
        Returns:
        the new copy

      • brighter

        public final HSLColor brighter(int k)
        Returns a brighter copy of this color.

        The lightness channel is multiplied by 0.7 ^ -k.

        Parameters:
        k - the gamma value
        Returns:
        the new copy

      • darker

        public final HSLColor darker()
        Returns a darker copy of this color yith a gamme of 1.
        Returns:
        the new copy

      • darker

        public final HSLColor darker(int k)
        Returns a darker copy of this color.

        The lightness channel is multiplied by 0.7 ^ k.

        Parameters:
        k - the gamma value
        Returns:
        the new copy
